tool_description: An API to fetch related data of ted talk
name: ted-talk-api
title: ted-talk-api

api_list.name: Get TED talk data related to keyword, views and likes
api_list.description: This endpoint returns TED talk data related to keyword, views and likes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ted-talk-api.p.rapidapi.com/talks?keyword=&views=&likes="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ted-talk-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all TED talk data
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the TED talk data
